short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A happy helper to aggregate your order details from online vendors.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A nifty too help you see your online purchases in a single view! Often times it's hard to know "what did I actually buy?" when looking at finances. To get into the nuts & bolts of finances you need to look at what you actually did buy, not just the vendor. 

This extension extracts a your order history and order details from the online platforms they choose to pull data from. 
-----------------------------

ğŸ”¨ Effortless Importing of your orders
*  Quickly import your purchases from popular retailers like Walmart, Target, and Amazon. You just login with your Chrome like you normally do & we use your session to import your orders 

ğŸˆ Categorized Spending
* View your purchases by category to better understand where your money is going. Less receipts with "I guess this just falls under our miscellaneous spending". 

ğŸ–¥ï¸ Unified Dashboard of all purchases
*  Access a single dashboard that shows all your purchases in an easy-to-read format. You don't have to keep logging in to multiple sites to view your previous purchases! 

ğŸ“Š Spending Reports
*  Generate reports that summarize your spending habits and highlight key insights. 

ğŸ”’ Secure & Private
* We avoid your data, so everything that is extracted is stored in your browser, not our servers or anyone else's, the data is yours!
